location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Umpherston Aitchison, Foreign Department, Government of India, Simla to John Cheape Brooke

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: A large piece of the paper booklet forming the bottom left corner of folios two and three has been torn off, however it does not affect the written contents of the letter.

mods.abstract: Brief letter informing Brook that the Maharaj Rana of Jhallawar [Jhalawar] is entitled to adopt a son as all other Chiefs in Rajpootana [Rajasthan] are.
